We may store and/or access information on a device and process personal data, such as your IP address and browsing data, for personalised advertising and content, advertising and content measurement, audience research and services development. Additionally, we may utilize precise geolocation data and identification through device scanning.</p><p>Please note that your consent will be valid across all our subdomains. border-color: transparent; background-color: transparent;" data-cky-tag="readmore-button">Cookie Policy</a></p></div><div class="cky-notice-btn-wrapper" data-cky-tag="notice-buttons"><button class="cky-btn cky-btn-customize" aria-label="Customise" aria-haspopup="dialog" aria-controls="ckyPreferenceCenter" data-cky-tag="settings-button" style="color: #1863DC; border-color: #1863DC; background-color: #FFFFFF;">Customise</button> <button class="cky-btn cky-btn-reject" aria-label="Essential Only" data-cky-tag="reject-button" style="color: #1863DC; border-color: #1863DC; background-color: #FFFFFF;">Essential Only</button> <button class="cky-btn cky-btn-accept" aria-label="Accept All" data-cky-tag="accept-button" style="color: #FFFFFF; border-color: #2F512A; background-color: #58964E;">Accept All</button></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cky-modal" tabindex="-1"><div class="cky-preference-center" data-cky-tag="detail" aria-label="Customise Consent Preferences" aria-modal="true" id="ckyPreferenceCenter" role="dialog" style="color: #212121; border-color: #F4F4F4; background-color: #FFFFFF;"><div class="cky-preference-header"><span class="cky-preference-title" aria-level="2" data-cky-tag="detail-title" role="heading" style="color: #212121;">Customise Consent Preferences</span> <button aria-label="Close" class="cky-btn-close" data-cky-tag="detail-close"><img alt="cky-close-icon" src="https://cdn-cookieyes.com/assets/images/close.svg"></button></div><div class="cky-iab-detail-wrapper" data-cky-tag="detail-iab-option"><div class="cky-iab-preference-des" data-cky-tag="detail-iab-description" style="color: #212121;"><p>Customise your consent preferences for Cookie Categories and advertising tracking preferences for Purposes & Features and Vendors below. You can give granular consent for each <button class="cky-iab-dec-btn" id="ckyIABPreferenceButton" aria-label="Third Party Vendor">Third Party Vendor</button>. class="cky-accordion-iab-item"> <div class="cky-accordion-chevron"> <i class="cky-chevron-right"></i> </div><div class="cky-accordion-header-wrapper"> <div class="cky-accordion-header"> <button id="ckyIABPNFSection1Body">  <div class="cky-child-accordion" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item1"> <div class="cky-child-accordion-item"> <div class="cky-child-accordion-chevron"> <i class="cky-chevron-right"></i> </div><div class="cky-child-accordion-header-wrapper"> <button class="cky-child-accordion-btn" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="ckyIABPNFSection1Item1Body" aria-label="Store and/or access information on a device">Store and/or access information on a device</button> <div class="cky-switch-wrapper">  <div class="cky-consent-switch-wrapper"> <div class="cky-switch-label">Consent</div><div class="cky-switch-sm"> <input type="checkbox" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item1ToggleConsent" aria-label="Enable Store and/or access information on a device Consent" autocomplete="off" style="background-color: rgb(208, 213, 210);"> </div></div> </div></div></div><div class="cky-child-accordion-body" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item1Body"> <div class="cky-iab-ad-settings-details"> <p class="cky-iab-ad-settings-details-des">Cookies, device or similar online identifiers (e.g. login-based identifiers, randomly assigned identifiers, network based identifiers) together with other information (e.g. browser type and information, language, screen size, supported technologies etc.) can be stored or read on your device to recognise it each time it connects to an app or to a website, for one or several of the purposes presented here.</p><div class="cky-iab-illustrations"> <p class="cky-iab-illustrations-title">Illustrations</p><ul class="cky-iab-illustrations-des"><li>Most purposes explained in this notice rely on the storage or accessing of information from your device when you use an app or visit a website. For example, a vendor or publisher might need to store a cookie on your device during your first visit on a website, to be able to recognise your device during your next visits (by accessing this cookie each time).</li></ul> </div> <p class="cky-iab-vendors-count-wrapper">Number of Vendors seeking consent: 175</p> </div></div></div> <div class="cky-child-accordion" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item2"> <div class="cky-child-accordion-item"> <div class="cky-child-accordion-chevron"> <i class="cky-chevron-right"></i> </div><div class="cky-child-accordion-header-wrapper"> <button class="cky-child-accordion-btn" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="ckyIABPNFSection1Item2Body" aria-label="Use limited data to select advertising">Use limited data to select advertising</button> <div class="cky-switch-wrapper"> <div class="cky-legitimate-switch-wrapper cky-switch-separator"> <div class="cky-switch-label">Legitimate Interest</div><div class="cky-switch-sm"> <input type="checkbox" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item2ToggleLegitimate" aria-label="Disable Use limited data to select advertising Legitimate Interest" autocomplete="off" style="background-color: rgb(88, 150, 78);"> </div></div> <div class="cky-consent-switch-wrapper"> <div class="cky-switch-label">Consent</div><div class="cky-switch-sm"> <input type="checkbox" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item2ToggleConsent" aria-label="Enable Use limited data to select advertising Consent" autocomplete="off" style="background-color: rgb(208, 213, 210);"> </div></div> </div></div></div><div class="cky-child-accordion-body" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item2Body"> <div class="cky-iab-ad-settings-details"> <p class="cky-iab-ad-settings-details-des">Advertising presented to you on this service can be based on limited data, such as the website or app you are using, your non-precise location, your device type or which content you are (or have been) interacting with (for example, to limit the number of times an ad is presented to you).</p><div class="cky-iab-illustrations"> <p class="cky-iab-illustrations-title">Illustrations</p><ul class="cky-iab-illustrations-des"><li>A car manufacturer wants to promote its electric vehicles to environmentally conscious users living in the city after office hours. The advertising is presented on a page with related content (such as an article on climate change actions) after 6:30 p.m. to users whose non-precise location suggests that they are in an urban zone.</li><li>A large producer of watercolour paints wants to carry out an online advertising campaign for its latest watercolour range, diversifying its audience to reach as many amateur and professional artists as possible and avoiding showing the ad next to mismatched content (for instance, articles about how to paint your house). The number of times that the ad has been presented to you is detected and limited, to avoid presenting it too often.</li></ul> </div> <p class="cky-iab-vendors-count-wrapper">Number of Vendors seeking consent or relying on legitimate interest: 161</p> </div></div></div> <div class="cky-child-accordion" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item3"> <div class="cky-child-accordion-item"> <div class="cky-child-accordion-chevron"> <i class="cky-chevron-right"></i> </div><div class="cky-child-accordion-header-wrapper"> <button class="cky-child-accordion-btn" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="ckyIABPNFSection1Item3Body" aria-label="Create profiles for personalised advertising">Create profiles for personalised advertising</button> <div class="cky-switch-wrapper">  <div class="cky-consent-switch-wrapper"> <div class="cky-switch-label">Consent</div><div class="cky-switch-sm"> <input type="checkbox" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item3ToggleConsent" aria-label="Enable Create profiles for personalised advertising Consent" autocomplete="off" style="background-color: rgb(208, 213, 210);"> </div></div> </div></div></div><div class="cky-child-accordion-body" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item3Body"> <div class="cky-iab-ad-settings-details"> <p class="cky-iab-ad-settings-details-des">Information about your activity on this service (such as forms you submit, content you look at) can be stored and combined with other information about you (for example, information from your previous activity on this service and other websites or apps) or similar users. This is then used to build or improve a profile about you (that might include possible interests and personal aspects). Your profile can be used (also later) to present advertising that appears more relevant based on your possible interests by this and other entities.</p><div class="cky-iab-illustrations"> <p class="cky-iab-illustrations-title">Illustrations</p><ul class="cky-iab-illustrations-des"><li>If you read several articles about the best bike accessories to buy, this information could be used to create a profile about your interest in bike accessories. Such a profile may be used or improved later on, on the same or a different website or app to present you with advertising for a particular bike accessory brand. If you also look at a configurator for a vehicle on a luxury car manufacturer website, this information could be combined with your interest in bikes to refine your profile and make an assumption that you are interested in luxury cycling gear.</li><li>An apparel company wishes to promote its new line of high-end baby clothes. It gets in touch with an agency that has a network of clients with high income customers (such as high-end supermarkets) and asks the agency to create profiles of young parents or couples who can be assumed to be wealthy and to have a new child, so that these can later be used to present advertising within partner apps based on those profiles.</li></ul> </div> <p class="cky-iab-vendors-count-wrapper">Number of Vendors seeking consent: 148</p> </div></div></div> <div class="cky-child-accordion" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item4"> <div class="cky-child-accordion-item"> <div class="cky-child-accordion-chevron"> <i class="cky-chevron-right"></i> </div><div class="cky-child-accordion-header-wrapper"> <button class="cky-child-accordion-btn" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="ckyIABPNFSection1Item4Body" aria-label="Use profiles to select personalised advertising">Use profiles to select personalised advertising</button> <div class="cky-switch-wrapper">  <div class="cky-consent-switch-wrapper"> <div class="cky-switch-label">Consent</div><div class="cky-switch-sm"> <input type="checkbox" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item4ToggleConsent" aria-label="Enable Use profiles to select personalised advertising Consent" autocomplete="off" style="background-color: rgb(208, 213, 210);"> </div></div> </div></div></div><div class="cky-child-accordion-body" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item4Body"> <div class="cky-iab-ad-settings-details"> <p class="cky-iab-ad-settings-details-des">Advertising presented to you on this service can be based on your advertising profiles, which can reflect your activity on this service or other websites or apps (like the forms you submit, content you look at), possible interests and personal aspects.</p><div class="cky-iab-illustrations"> <p class="cky-iab-illustrations-title">Illustrations</p><ul class="cky-iab-illustrations-des"><li>An online retailer wants to advertise a limited sale on running shoes. It wants to target advertising to users who previously looked at running shoes on its mobile app. Tracking technologies might be used to recognise that you have previously used the mobile app to consult running shoes, in order to present you with the corresponding advertisement on the app.</li><li>A profile created for personalised advertising in relation to a person having searched for bike accessories on a website can be used to present the relevant advertisement for bike accessories on a mobile app of another organisation.</li></ul> </div> <p class="cky-iab-vendors-count-wrapper">Number of Vendors seeking consent: 147</p> </div></div></div> <div class="cky-child-accordion" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item5"> <div class="cky-child-accordion-item"> <div class="cky-child-accordion-chevron"> <i class="cky-chevron-right"></i> </div><div class="cky-child-accordion-header-wrapper"> <button class="cky-child-accordion-btn" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="ckyIABPNFSection1Item5Body" aria-label="Create profiles to personalise content">Create profiles to personalise content</button> <div class="cky-switch-wrapper">  <div class="cky-consent-switch-wrapper"> <div class="cky-switch-label">Consent</div><div class="cky-switch-sm"> <input type="checkbox" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item5ToggleConsent" aria-label="Enable Create profiles to personalise content Consent" autocomplete="off" style="background-color: rgb(208, 213, 210);"> </div></div> </div></div></div><div class="cky-child-accordion-body" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item5Body"> <div class="cky-iab-ad-settings-details"> <p class="cky-iab-ad-settings-details-des">Information about your activity on this service (for instance, forms you submit, non-advertising content you look at) can be stored and combined with other information about you (such as your previous activity on this service or other websites or apps) or similar users. This is then used to build or improve a profile about you (which might for example include possible interests and personal aspects). Your profile can be used (also later) to present content that appears more relevant based on your possible interests, such as by adapting the order in which content is shown to you, so that it is even easier for you to find content that matches your interests.</p><div class="cky-iab-illustrations"> <p class="cky-iab-illustrations-title">Illustrations</p><ul class="cky-iab-illustrations-des"><li>You read several articles on how to build a treehouse on a social media platform. This information might be added to a profile to mark your interest in content related to outdoors as well as do-it-yourself guides (with the objective of allowing the personalisation of content, so that for example you are presented with more blog posts and articles on treehouses and wood cabins in the future).</li><li>You have viewed three videos on space exploration across different TV apps. An unrelated news platform with which you have had no contact builds a profile based on that viewing behaviour, marking space exploration as a topic of possible interest for other videos.</li></ul> </div> <p class="cky-iab-vendors-count-wrapper">Number of Vendors seeking consent: 47</p> </div></div></div> <div class="cky-child-accordion" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item6"> <div class="cky-child-accordion-item"> <div class="cky-child-accordion-chevron"> <i class="cky-chevron-right"></i> </div><div class="cky-child-accordion-header-wrapper"> <button class="cky-child-accordion-btn" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="ckyIABPNFSection1Item6Body" aria-label="Use profiles to select personalised content">Use profiles to select personalised content</button> <div class="cky-switch-wrapper">  <div class="cky-consent-switch-wrapper"> <div class="cky-switch-label">Consent</div><div class="cky-switch-sm"> <input type="checkbox" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item6ToggleConsent" aria-label="Enable Use profiles to select personalised content Consent" autocomplete="off" style="background-color: rgb(208, 213, 210);"> </div></div> </div></div></div><div class="cky-child-accordion-body" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item6Body"> <div class="cky-iab-ad-settings-details"> <p class="cky-iab-ad-settings-details-des">Content presented to you on this service can be based on your content personalisation profiles, which can reflect your activity on this or other services (for instance, the forms you submit, content you look at), possible interests and personal aspects. This can for example be used to adapt the order in which content is shown to you, so that it is even easier for you to find (non-advertising) content that matches your interests.</p><div class="cky-iab-illustrations"> <p class="cky-iab-illustrations-title">Illustrations</p><ul class="cky-iab-illustrations-des"><li>You read articles on vegetarian food on a social media platform and then use the cooking app of an unrelated company. The profile built about you on the social media platform will be used to present you vegetarian recipes on the welcome screen of the cooking app.</li><li>You have viewed three videos about rowing across different websites. An unrelated video sharing platform will recommend five other videos on rowing that may be of interest to you when you use your TV app, based on a profile built about you when you visited those different websites to watch online videos.</li></ul> </div> <p class="cky-iab-vendors-count-wrapper">Number of Vendors seeking consent: 39</p> </div></div></div> <div class="cky-child-accordion" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item7"> <div class="cky-child-accordion-item"> <div class="cky-child-accordion-chevron"> <i class="cky-chevron-right"></i> </div><div class="cky-child-accordion-header-wrapper"> <button class="cky-child-accordion-btn" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="ckyIABPNFSection1Item7Body" aria-label="Measure advertising performance">Measure advertising performance</button> <div class="cky-switch-wrapper"> <div class="cky-legitimate-switch-wrapper cky-switch-separator"> <div class="cky-switch-label">Legitimate Interest</div><div class="cky-switch-sm"> <input type="checkbox" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item7ToggleLegitimate" aria-label="Disable Measure advertising performance Legitimate Interest" autocomplete="off" style="background-color: rgb(88, 150, 78);"> </div></div> <div class="cky-consent-switch-wrapper"> <div class="cky-switch-label">Consent</div><div class="cky-switch-sm"> <input type="checkbox" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item7ToggleConsent" aria-label="Enable Measure advertising performance Consent" autocomplete="off" style="background-color: rgb(208, 213, 210);"> </div></div> </div></div></div><div class="cky-child-accordion-body" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item7Body"> <div class="cky-iab-ad-settings-details"> <p class="cky-iab-ad-settings-details-des">Information regarding which advertising is presented to you and how you interact with it can be used to determine how well an advert has worked for you or other users and whether the goals of the advertising were reached. For instance, whether you saw an ad, whether you clicked on it, whether it led you to buy a product or visit a website, etc. This is very helpful to understand the relevance of advertising campaigns.</p><div class="cky-iab-illustrations"> <p class="cky-iab-illustrations-title">Illustrations</p><ul class="cky-iab-illustrations-des"><li>You have clicked on an advertisement about a black Friday discount by an online shop on the website of a publisher and purchased a product. Your click will be linked to this purchase. Your interaction and that of other users will be measured to know how many clicks on the ad led to a purchase.</li><li>You are one of very few to have clicked on an advertisement about an international appreciation day discount by an online gift shop within the app of a publisher. The publisher wants to have reports to understand how often a specific ad placement within the app, and notably the international appreciation day ad, has been viewed or clicked by you and other users, in order to help the publisher and its partners (such as agencies) optimise ad placements.</li></ul> </div> <p class="cky-iab-vendors-count-wrapper">Number of Vendors seeking consent or relying on legitimate interest: 172</p> </div></div></div> <div class="cky-child-accordion" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item8"> <div class="cky-child-accordion-item"> <div class="cky-child-accordion-chevron"> <i class="cky-chevron-right"></i> </div><div class="cky-child-accordion-header-wrapper"> <button class="cky-child-accordion-btn" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="ckyIABPNFSection1Item8Body" aria-label="Measure content performance">Measure content performance</button> <div class="cky-switch-wrapper"> <div class="cky-legitimate-switch-wrapper cky-switch-separator"> <div class="cky-switch-label">Legitimate Interest</div><div class="cky-switch-sm"> <input type="checkbox" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item8ToggleLegitimate" aria-label="Disable Measure content performance Legitimate Interest" autocomplete="off" style="background-color: rgb(88, 150, 78);"> </div></div> <div class="cky-consent-switch-wrapper"> <div class="cky-switch-label">Consent</div><div class="cky-switch-sm"> <input type="checkbox" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item8ToggleConsent" aria-label="Enable Measure content performance Consent" autocomplete="off" style="background-color: rgb(208, 213, 210);"> </div></div> </div></div></div><div class="cky-child-accordion-body" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item8Body"> <div class="cky-iab-ad-settings-details"> <p class="cky-iab-ad-settings-details-des">Information regarding which content is presented to you and how you interact with it can be used to determine whether the (non-advertising) content e.g. reached its intended audience and matched your interests. For instance, whether you read an article, watch a video, listen to a podcast or look at a product description, how long you spent on this service and the web pages you visit etc. This is very helpful to understand the relevance of (non-advertising) content that is shown to you.</p><div class="cky-iab-illustrations"> <p class="cky-iab-illustrations-title">Illustrations</p><ul class="cky-iab-illustrations-des"><li>You have read a blog post about hiking on a mobile app of a publisher and followed a link to a recommended and related post. Your interactions will be recorded as showing that the initial hiking post was useful to you and that it was successful in interesting you in the related post. This will be measured to know whether to produce more posts on hiking in the future and where to place them on the home screen of the mobile app.</li><li>You were presented a video on fashion trends, but you and several other users stopped watching after 30 seconds. This information is then used to evaluate the right length of future videos on fashion trends.</li></ul> </div> <p class="cky-iab-vendors-count-wrapper">Number of Vendors seeking consent or relying on legitimate interest: 68</p> </div></div></div> <div class="cky-child-accordion" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item9"> <div class="cky-child-accordion-item"> <div class="cky-child-accordion-chevron"> <i class="cky-chevron-right"></i> </div><div class="cky-child-accordion-header-wrapper"> <button class="cky-child-accordion-btn" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="ckyIABPNFSection1Item9Body" aria-label="Understand audiences through statistics or combinations of data from different sources">Understand audiences through statistics or combinations of data from different sources</button> <div class="cky-switch-wrapper"> <div class="cky-legitimate-switch-wrapper cky-switch-separator"> <div class="cky-switch-label">Legitimate Interest</div><div class="cky-switch-sm"> <input type="checkbox" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item9ToggleLegitimate" aria-label="Disable Understand audiences through statistics or combinations of data from different sources Legitimate Interest" autocomplete="off"             <div class="panel-content border--no-border-top border--no-border-bottom">
                <p>Alondra was in receipt of 4lb from EL BUFALO when she completed the second leg of a C&D brace on Friday, but she has a double penalty to carry this time and the runner-up can reverse the form on the revised terms. Lion's House has also been in good form of late and he steps back up in class with a realistic chance of being a key player in what could turn out to be a tactical affair.</p>
            </div>
            <div class="panel-footer p--x-small">
                <p>
                        <b>Top Tip:</b>
        <a href="/form/horse/El-Bufalo/GB/3595383?raceid=1572089" data-url="/form-popup/horse/El-Bufalo/GB/3595383?raceid=1572089" data-cookie="popupForm" data-options="{"theme": "white"}" class="text-transform--uppercase tooltip tooltipstered a--plain js-popup-trigger">El Bufalo</a>
(2)                        <br>

                        <b>Watch out for:</b> 
        <a href="/form/horse/Alondra/GB/3613993?raceid=1572089" data-url="/form-popup/horse/Alondra/GB/3613993?raceid=1572089" data-cookie="popupForm" data-options="{"theme": "white"}" class="text-transform--uppercase tooltip tooltipstered a--plain js-popup-trigger">Alondra</a>
(1)                </p>
            </div>


                    </section>
                </div>

                <div id="verdict-tf-1572089" class="tabs__content is-hidden">
                    <section class="panel">



            <div class="panel-content border--no-border-top border--no-border-bottom">
                <p>Alondra got the better of EL BUFALO and Gogo Yubari here last time and the trio could have this between them once again. The winner that day got first run on the other pair having sat just off the frontrunner but his 5lb rise in the weights is offset by her jockey's claim so she holds every chance again. The latter has held her form well in defeat since completing a double at the start of the year but does appear to be in the grip of the handicapper at present. It is the gelding who is preferred after finishing well last time despite a wide trip throughout at this sharp venue. He was in career best form prior to that defeat so if he can get an early position here from a better draw he could reverse the form.</p>
            </div>

            <div class="panel-content border--no-border-top border--no-border-bottom">
                <p>Rambuso Creek is too well handicapped to totally ignore and he could offer some each-way value if he steps forward from an improved Southwell effort. However, a chance is taken on INSTANT BOND, who has been the subject of good support on a couple of occasions this winter. He still has more to offer over this trip and could be a surprise package on his first run here. Bad Habits and Oldbury Lad are more obvious ones to monitor in the betting.</p>
            </div>
            <div class="panel-footer p--x-small">
                <p>
                        <b>Top Tip:</b>
        <a href="/form/horse/Instant-Bond/GB/3698936?raceid=1566530" data-url="/form-popup/horse/Instant-Bond/GB/3698936?raceid=1566530" data-cookie="popupForm" data-options="{"theme": "white"}" class="text-transform--uppercase tooltip tooltipstered a--plain js-popup-trigger">Instant Bond</a>
(5)                        <br>

                        <b>Watch out for:</b> 
        <a href="/form/horse/Rambuso-Creek/IRE/3324856?raceid=1566530" data-url="/form-popup/horse/Rambuso-Creek/IRE/3324856?raceid=1566530" data-cookie="popupForm" data-options="{"theme": "white"}" class="text-transform--uppercase tooltip tooltipstered a--plain js-popup-trigger">Rambuso Creek</a>
(1)                </p>
            </div>


                    </section>
                </div>

                <div id="verdict-tf-1566530" class="tabs__content is-hidden">
                    <section class="panel">



            <div class="panel-content border--no-border-top border--no-border-bottom">
                <p>BAD HABITS has held his form well in defeat since winning over C&D at the end of last year. His latest run is worth marking up as he did much the best of those forcing the pace and he's effectively 2lb lower here with his jockey's claim. Rambuso Creek still has to prove his stamina for 7f but he finished well over 6f last time and he's been hinting at a revival of a much reduced mark of late. He can fill the places with Instant Bond who was unusually below par last time but was in good form previously.</p>
            </div>

            <div class="panel-content border--no-border-top border--no-border-bottom">
                <p>With her yard in good form, LOVETHISWAYAGAIN is hard to ignore. After filling the runner-up slot behind a couple of useful types on her last two starts, the daughter of No Nay Never wouldn't need much of a step forward to go one better. Arishka's Dream is rated just 2lb inferior to the selection, but the terms of this maiden leave her with a stiff task ahead. Therefore, the unexposed Perola, a half-brother to a couple of all-weather winners, could be a bigger danger with Donagh Murphy claiming 7lb. </p>
            </div>
            <div class="panel-footer p--x-small">
                <p>
                        <b>Top Tip:</b>
        <a href="/form/horse/Lovethiswayagain/IRE/3767819?raceid=1566527" data-url="/form-popup/horse/Lovethiswayagain/IRE/3767819?raceid=1566527" data-cookie="popupForm" data-options="{"theme": "white"}" class="text-transform--uppercase tooltip tooltipstered a--plain js-popup-trigger">Lovethiswayagain</a>

(2)                </p>

                <div id="verdict-tf-1566527" class="tabs__content is-hidden">
                    <section class="panel">



            <div class="panel-content border--no-border-top border--no-border-bottom">
                <p>A weak contest can go to the experienced LOVETHISWAYAGAIN who sets the standard on her pair of recent runner up efforts. She split a pair of in form rivals last time over C&D and a repeat would be enough. Perola was turned over at short odds last time but holds strong claims on the basis of his debut runner up effort though he does have his fitness to prove after an absence. If getting a fast pace to settle off as he did last time then Arishka's Dream will also be competitive.</p>

            <div class="panel-content border--no-border-top border--no-border-bottom">
                <p>HIERARCHY's latest start proved he retains the ability to swoop and conquer in a race of this nature and a 3lb rise for his Lingfield win is manageable. Silky Wilkie set a scorching pace in that race and the revised terms give him a feasible chance of holding on to better than that fourth-placed finish. Papa Cocktail, who had the measure of his nearest rival Water Of Leith when he won over C&D last month, is another to seriously consider, despite a 5lb rise.</p>
            </div>
            <div class="panel-footer p--x-small">
                <p>
                        <b>Top Tip:</b>
        <a href="/form/horse/Hierarchy/IRE/3327915?raceid=1566526" data-url="/form-popup/horse/Hierarchy/IRE/3327915?raceid=1566526" data-cookie="popupForm" data-options="{"theme": "white"}" class="text-transform--uppercase tooltip tooltipstered a--plain js-popup-trigger">Hierarchy</a>
(3)                        <br>

                        <b>Watch out for:</b> 
        <a href="/form/horse/Silky-Wilkie/IRE/3320079?raceid=1566526" data-url="/form-popup/horse/Silky-Wilkie/IRE/3320079?raceid=1566526" data-cookie="popupForm" data-options="{"theme": "white"}" class="text-transform--uppercase tooltip tooltipstered a--plain js-popup-trigger">Silky Wilkie</a>
(1)                </p>
            </div>


                    </section>
                </div>

                <div id="verdict-tf-1566526" class="tabs__content is-hidden">
                    <section class="panel">



            <div class="panel-content border--no-border-top border--no-border-bottom">
                <p>Veteran SILKY WILKIE has returned to form of late and remains very well treated on his old efforts. The former Scottish Sprint Cup winner's last run is worth marking up considerably as he was taken on up front before tiring late. If going a more sensible gallop he can get the better of Lequinto who was back in form until failing to stay 7f last time. He can quickly bounced back returned to a suitable distance and fill the places with veteran Hierarchy who has been thriving of late but will need a bit more off this revised mark.</p>
            </div>

                    <section class="panel">


            <div class="panel-content border--no-border-top border--no-border-bottom">
                <p>BEAUZON has been in unstoppable form of late and it would be dangerous to assume an 8lb penalty is enough to prevent him from completing a five-timer. Considering that Ryan Kavanagh reduces the burden to 3lb with his claim, connections have given the seven-year-old every chance of extending the winning sequence. Last-time-out C&D winner He's An Angel is still well handicapped, despite going up 3lb, and is very capable of spoiling the party for the selection. Ardaddy and Sioux Warrior can also go close.</p>
            </div>
            <div class="panel-footer p--x-small">
                <p>
                        <b>Top Tip:</b>
        <a href="/form/horse/Beauzon/GB/3291688?raceid=1566525" data-url="/form-popup/horse/Beauzon/GB/3291688?raceid=1566525" data-cookie="popupForm" data-options="{"theme": "white"}" class="text-transform--uppercase tooltip tooltipstered a--plain js-popup-trigger">Beauzon</a>
(3)                        <br>

                        <b>Watch out for:</b> 
        <a href="/form/horse/Hes-An-Angel/GB/3419619?raceid=1566525" data-url="/form-popup/horse/Hes-An-Angel/GB/3419619?raceid=1566525" data-cookie="popupForm" data-options="{"theme": "white"}" class="text-transform--uppercase tooltip tooltipstered a--plain js-popup-trigger">He's An Angel</a>
(5)                </p>
            </div>


                    </section>
                </div>

                <div id="verdict-tf-1566525" class="tabs__content is-hidden">
                    <section class="panel">



            <div class="panel-content border--no-border-top border--no-border-bottom">
                <p>BEAUZON can continue the winning sequence here. He had a bit in hand when winning last time despite being ridden very aggressively suggesting that this sharper track will suit. His 4lb rise is more than offset by his jockey's claim so he should be tough to beat. The consistent Ardaddy is just 2lb above his last winning mark and looks an obvious danger along with He's An Angel. That rival snapped a long losing run last time and remains very well treated on his old form.</p>
            </div>

            <div class="panel-content border--no-border-top border--no-border-bottom">
                <p>Taryn Langley was on board when MAGIC RUNNER struck over slightly further here last month and Ruth Carr's filly has acquitted herself well in defeat twice since. She was only beaten two lengths off this mark most recently so still seems feasibly treated with the 5lb claimer retained. Dandy Khan arrives in decent form but she has stamina to prove. Therefore, Three On Thursday, who has gone off favourite on her last couple of outings, is put forward as the primary threat.</p>
            </div>

(6)                </p>

                <div id="verdict-tf-1566524" class="tabs__content is-hidden">
                    <section class="panel">



            <div class="panel-content border--no-border-top border--no-border-bottom">
                <p>THREE ON THURSDAY was a 10f winner at the end of last year and has held her form well in defeat since. She showed a willing attitude last time when outstayed over 12f and is fancied to build on that back down in distance off an unchanged mark. The consistent multiple course winner Magic Runner also drops in trip and looks the obvious danger while at a bigger price top weight Renesmee is also respected. Her form has tailed off recently but she is now back on a winning mark and will appreciate this stiffer test than last time.</p>
            </div>

            <div class="panel-content border--no-border-top border--no-border-bottom">
                <p>Hackney Diamonds has made the frame twice since a Southwell triumph last month and should be in the thick of the action again. Little Miss India took a big step back in the right direction when touched off at Lingfield, but this can go the way of ZENATO. The Fergal O'Brien-trained five-year-old registered a double over hurdles back in the autumn and can capitalise on what could be a lenient rating back in this sphere.</p>
            </div>
            <div class="panel-footer p--x-small">
                <p>
                        <b>Top Tip:</b>

(7)                </p>

                <div id="verdict-tf-1566529" class="tabs__content is-hidden">
                    <section class="panel">



            <div class="panel-content border--no-border-top border--no-border-bottom">
                <p>In form HACKNEY DIAMONDS gets the verdict here. She was let down by a slow start last time but still ran well and the form of her win last month has been boosted significantly. With her jockey's claim here she is racing off the same mark and can defeat Little Miss India who was just out-battled late by a strong stayer over 12f last time. She arrives in good form and can fill the places with recent hurdles winner Zenato who hasn't been seen in this sphere for a while but could be on a generous mark.</p>
